POST /InStock HTTP/1.1
Host: www.example.org
Content-Type: application/soap+xml; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: 299
SOAPAction: "http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope"

<?xml version="1.0"?>
<soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope" xmlns:m="http://www.example.org">
  <soap:Header>
  </soap:Header>
  <soap:Body>
    <m:GetStockPrice>
      <m:StockName>T</m:StockName>
    </m:GetStockPrice>
  </soap:Body>
</soap:Envelope>
```

Post._content:
## k8s yaml

### yaml

YAMLjson

YAML

```


Tal

# 
```

KubernetesListsMaps

YAML Maps

MapKey:Value 

```
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
--- apiVersionkindv1Pod
```

MapsvalueMaps

```
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: kube100-site
  labels:
    app: web
```

List

```
args
 -beijing
 -shanghai
 -shenzhen
 -guangzhou
```

ListsMapsMapsList

```
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: kube100-site
  labels:
    app: web
spec:
  containers:
    - name: front-end
      image: nginx
      ports:
        - containerPort: 80
    - name: flaskapp-demo
      image: jcdemo/flaskapp
      ports: 8080
```



### k8s yaml

```
apiVersion: v1             #apikubectl apiversion  
kind: Pod                  #/  
metadata:                  #/  
  name: web04-pod          #namespace  
  labels:                  #http://blog.csdn.net/liyingke112/article/details/77482384
    k8s-app: apache  
    version: v1  
    kubernetes.io/cluster-service: "true"  
  annotations:             #  
    - name: String         #  
spec:#specification of the resource content   
  restartPolicy: Always    #k8s  
  nodeSelector:            #kubectl label nodes kube-node1 zone=node1  
    zone: node1  
  containers:  
  - name: web04-pod        #  
    image: web:apache      #  
    imagePullPolicy: Never #AlwaysNeverIfNotPresentregisteryimages
                           # Always
                           # Never
                           # IfNotPresent
    command: ['sh']        #Entrypoint,DockefileENTRYPOINT  
    args: ["$(str)"]       #DockerfileCMD  
    env:                   #  
    - name: str            #  
      value: "/etc/run.sh" #  
    resources:             #http://blog.csdn.net/liyingke112/article/details/77452630
      requests:            #  
        cpu: 0.1           #CPU+m0.1=100m0.0011m
        memory: 32Mi       #  
      limits:              #  
        cpu: 0.5  
        memory: 32Mi  
    ports:  
    - containerPort: 80    #
      name: httpd          #
      protocol: TCP  
    livenessProbe:         #podhttp://blog.csdn.net/liyingke112/article/details/77531584
      httpGet:             #httpget200-399  
        path: /            #URI  
        port: 80  
        #host: 127.0.0.1   #  
        scheme: HTTP  
      initialDelaySeconds: 180 #  
      timeoutSeconds: 5    #  
      periodSeconds: 15    #  
      #  
      #exec: 0  
      #  command:  
      #    - cat  
      #    - /tmp/health  
      #  
      #tcpSocket: //tcpSocket   
      #  port: number   
    lifecycle:             #  
      postStart:           #  
        exec:  
          command:  
            - 'sh'  
            - 'yum upgrade -y'  
      preStop:             #  
        exec:  
          command: ['service httpd stop']  
    volumeMounts:          #http://blog.csdn.net/liyingke112/article/details/76577520
    - name: volume         #volumes[*].name     
      mountPath: /data     #  
      readOnly: True  
  volumes:                 #  
  - name: volume           #  
    #meptyDir: {}  
    hostPath:  
      path: /opt           #hostPath/opt,  
```



### k8s 

##### kubernetespod

```
docker
docker 
docker exec -ti  <your-container-name>   /bin/sh

pod
kubectl exec -ti <your-pod-name>  -n <your-namespace>  -- /bin/sh
```



##### k8spod

k8s

```
 containers:
    - name: test
      image: nginx:1.7.9     #tag
      imagePullPolicy: Never
```

Always 

IfNotPresent ,

Never 

imagePullPolicy tag :latest always   IfNotPresent

### k8s yaml

```
apiVersion: v1             #apikubectl apiversion  
kind: Pod                  #/  
metadata:                  #/  
  name: web04-pod          #namespace  
  labels:                  #http://blog.csdn.net/liyingke112/article/details/77482384
    k8s-app: apache  
    version: v1  
    kubernetes.io/cluster-service: "true"  
  annotations:             #  
    - name: String         #  
spec:#specification of the resource content   
  restartPolicy: Always    #k8s  
  nodeSelector:            #kubectl label nodes kube-node1 zone=node1  
    zone: node1  
  containers:  
  - name: web04-pod        #  
    image: web:apache      #  
    imagePullPolicy: Never #AlwaysNeverIfNotPresentregisteryimages
                           # Always
                           # Never
                           # IfNotPresent
    command: ['sh']        #Entrypoint,DockefileENTRYPOINT  
    args: ["$(str)"]       #DockerfileCMD  
    env:                   #  
    - name: str            #  
      value: "/etc/run.sh" #  
    resources:             #http://blog.csdn.net/liyingke112/article/details/77452630
      requests:            #  
        cpu: 0.1           #CPU+m0.1=100m0.0011m
        memory: 32Mi       #  
      limits:              #  
        cpu: 0.5  
        memory: 32Mi  
    ports:  
    - containerPort: 80    #
      name: httpd          #
      protocol: TCP  
    livenessProbe:         #podhttp://blog.csdn.net/liyingke112/article/details/77531584
      httpGet:             #httpget200-399  
        path: /            #URI  
        port: 80  
        #host: 127.0.0.1   #  
        scheme: HTTP  
      initialDelaySeconds: 180 #  
      timeoutSeconds: 5    #  
      periodSeconds: 15    #  
      #  
      #exec: 0  
      #  command:  
      #    - cat  
      #    - /tmp/health  
      #  
      #tcpSocket: //tcpSocket   
      #  port: number   
    lifecycle:             #  
      postStart:           #  
        exec:  
          command:  
            - 'sh'  
            - 'yum upgrade -y'  
      preStop:             #  
        exec:  
          command: ['service httpd stop']  
    volumeMounts:          #http://blog.csdn.net/liyingke112/article/details/76577520
    - name: volume         #volumes[*].name     
      mountPath: /data     #  
      readOnly: True  
  volumes:                 #  
  - name: volume           #  
    #meptyDir: {}  
    hostPath:  
      path: /opt           #hostPath/opt,  
```

Post._content:
### 

`git pull` `up-to-date`

Headmaster

Headmaster:

```
$ git checkout master 
$ git reset --hard
```

pull

```
$ git fetch --all  
$ git reset --hard origin/master 
$ git pull
```
Post.raw:
### 

`git pull` `up-to-date`

Headmaster

Headmaster:

```
$ git checkout master 
$ git reset --hard
```

pull

```
$ git fetch --all  
$ git reset --hard origin/master 
$ git pull
```
